channel.title: CWE-209 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-209 on ZAP

item.title: Full Path Disclosure
item.description: The full path of files which might be sensitive has been exposed to the client.

item.title: Generic Padding Oracle
item.description: By manipulating the padding on an encrypted string, an attacker is able to generate an error message that indicates a likely ‘padding oracle’ vulnerability. Such a vulnerability can affect any application or framework that uses encryption improperly, such as some versions of ASP.net, Java Server Faces, and Mono. An attacker may exploit this issue to decrypt data and recover encryption keys, potentially viewing and modifying confidential data.

item.title: Information Disclosure - Java Stack Trace
item.description: A Java stack trace was found in the HTTP response body.

item.title: Information Disclosure - SQL Error
item.description: An SQL error was found in the HTTP response body.
